Reception given to mark Independence Day of Nigeria 
    Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Alhaji Daudu Sulaiman, Nigerian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the embassy yesterday to mark the 41st anniversary of the Independence of Nigeria.
 Present on invitation were vice-president Yang Hyong Sop of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, vice-minister Kung Sok Ung of foreign affairs, vice-chairman Kim Jin Bom of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and officials concerned, and foreign diplomatic envoys here.    
 Speeches were made at the reception.
